task_1.description: Place the light blue cup on top of the paper cup
task_1.initial_setup: The light blue cup is upright on the left side of the table, 10 cm from the edge. The paper cup is upright on the right side of the table, 15 cm from the edge. Both cups are facing the same direction (front side up).
task_1.final_state: The light blue cup is upright and placed on top of the paper cup, which remains upright on the table.

task_2.description: Move the yellow cup to the center of the table without touching the white cup
task_2.initial_setup: The yellow cup is tilted forward on the left side of the table, 5 cm from the edge. The white cup is upright on the right side of the table, 10 cm from the edge.
task_2.final_state: The yellow cup is upright and centered on the table, 5 cm from the edge. The white cup remains untouched on the right side.

task_3.description: Stack the pink and lavender cups in ascending order of size (pink on bottom, lavender on top)
task_3.initial_setup: The pink cup is upright on the left side, 12 cm from the edge. The lavender cup is upright on the right side, 8 cm from the edge. Both cups are facing the same direction.
task_3.final_state: The pink cup is upright on the left side, and the lavender cup is placed on top of it, centered above.

task_4.description: Remove the white cup from the table without knocking over the mint cup
task_4.initial_setup: The white cup is upright on the center of the table, 5 cm from the edge. The mint cup is tilted backward on the left side, 10 cm from the edge.
task_4.final_state: The white cup is removed from the table. The mint cup remains tilted on the left side.

task_5.description: Place the lavender cup in the position of the yellow cup, then move the yellow cup to the far right
task_5.initial_setup: The lavender cup is upright on the left side, 15 cm from the edge. The yellow cup is upright on the far right, 10 cm from the edge.
task_5.final_state: The lavender cup is upright on the far right, 10 cm from the edge. The yellow cup is upright on the left side, 15 cm from the edge.

task_6.description: Arrange the cups in a line from left to right based on their color intensity (lightest to darkest)
task_6.required_objects: light blue, white, pink, lavender, mint, yellow
task_6.initial_setup: All six cups are upright on the table in random positions: light blue on the far left, white in the center, pink on the right, and the others scattered.
task_6.final_state: The cups are arranged in a straight line from left to right: white (lightest), light blue, mint, lavender, pink, yellow (darkest).

task_7.final_state: The paper cup is upright and placed on top of the mint cup, which remains upright.
